trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection"></xref> class is a collection of service principal names that represent a configuration element for an <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection"></xref> class.

The <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Add(System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement)"></xref> method adds a <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement"></xref> instance to this <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Add%2A> method ignores a duplicate name provided in the `element` parameter.

The <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection> class is a collection of Service Principal Names (SPNs) that represent a configuration element for an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>.

The <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement"></xref> instance to add to this <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection"></xref>.

The <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Clear"></xref> method removes all configuration element objects from this <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection"></xref>.

The <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.IndexOf(System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement)"></xref> method retrieves the index of the specified configuration element in this <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection"></xref>.

The <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement"></xref> instance to retrieve the index of in this <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection"></xref>.

The index of the specified <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement"></xref> in this <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection"></xref>.

The <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Item(System.String)"></xref> property gets or sets the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement"></xref> instance at the specified index location.

The index of the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement"></xref> instance in this <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement"></xref> instance requested.
If the requested instance is not found, then `null` is returned.

The <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Item(System.String)"></xref> property gets or sets the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement"></xref> instance based on a string that represents the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement"></xref> instance.

A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that represents the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement"></xref> instance in this <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement"></xref> instance requested.
If the requested instance is not found, then `null` is returned.

The <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Remove(System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement)"></xref> method removes a <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement"></xref> instance from this <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection"></xref>.

The <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement"></xref> instance to remove from this <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection"></xref>.
element is `null`.

The <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Remove(System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement)"></xref> method removes a <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement"></xref> instance from this <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection"></xref> based on the <xref href="System.String"></xref> specified.

A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that represents the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement"></xref> instance to remove from this <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection"></xref>

The <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Remove(System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement)"></xref> method removes a <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement"></xref> instance from this <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection"></xref> based on the index specified.

The index of the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement"></xref> instance to remove from this <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection"></xref>.
